review: Guest house is located close to the main market and not very far from the Airport. The host are very empathetic and make sure your stay is wonderful. Food is yummy and the rooms are cozy. 5/5 for the entire stay.
name: AJPB2002

review: the room is very tidy and clean, large and air flow. good view, in the parlour, there are many many books . they also have  heater and hot shower , the garden is nice ( they have glasshouse for plants )
name: smilezine
